K06bsu052_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena arhadbhikṣusahasreṇa,
K06bsu052_u:5: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhānāṃ paripūrṇairdaśabhirbodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvairavinivartanīyairanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K06bsu052_u:11: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'ruṇodgatakālasamaye svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K06bsu052_u:12: upasaṃkramya vihārasya bahirdvāre sthito 'bhūttathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
K06bsu052_u:13: athāyuṣmānapi śāradvatīputraḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmadbhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
K06bsu052_u:19: anye ca mahāśrāvakāḥ svakasvakebhyo vihārebhyo niṣkramya yena bhagavato vihārastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
K06bsu052_u:21: atha khalu bhagavānabhikrāntābhikrāntaṃ mahāśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ viditvā svakādvihārānniṣkramya bahirdvārasyaikānte prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat
K06bsu052_u:22: niṣadya ca bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma - kutastvaṃ śāradvatīputra kalyamevāgatya tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ?
K06bsu052_u:23: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - sarvaprathamataraṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ,
K06bsu052_u:25: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - satyaṃ kila
K06bsu052_u:26: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvaprathamataraṃ tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitastathāgatasya darśanāya
K06bsu052_u:28: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - evametat bhagavan,
K06bsu052_u:31: upasaṃkramya ekānte sthito bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
K06bsu052_u:33: tathā hi bhagavan atṛpto 'haṃ tathāgatasya darśanena vandanena paryupāsanena ca /
K06bsu052_u:34: yadapyahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamupasaṃkramāmi darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
K06bsu052_u:41: yathāhaṃ paśyāmi yathāhaṃ vande yathāhaṃ paryupāse /
K06bsu052_u:42: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca /
K06bsu052_u:43: ahaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
K06bsu052_u:44: bhagavānāha - kathaṃ mañjuśrīstathāgato draṣṭavyo yāvat paryupāsitavyaḥ?
K06bsu052_u:45: mañjuśrīrāha - tathatākāreṇa tathāgataṃ paśyāmi avikalpākāreṇa anupalambhayogena,
K06bsu052_u:54: na tathatā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
K06bsu052_u:62: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca /
K06bsu052_u:63: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - evaṃ paśyaṃstvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kiṃ paśyasi?
K06bsu052_u:64: mañjuśrīrāha - evaṃ paśyannahaṃ bhagavan na kiṃcitpaśyāmi /
K06bsu052_u:65: evamahaṃ paśyan na kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ paśyāmi na nirodhaṃ paśyāmi //
K06bsu052_u:66: athāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - duṣkarakārakastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ,
K06bsu052_u:68: yasya ca te sarvasattvānāmantike mahāmaitrī pratyupasthitā /
K06bsu052_u:69: na ca te kācitsattvopalabdhiḥ sattvābhiniveśo vā /
K06bsu052_u:72: sarvasattvānāṃ ca te kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
K06bsu052_u:74: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - evametad bhadanta śāradvatīputra yathā kathayasi /
K06bsu052_u:76: na ca me kācit sattvopalabdhirvā sattvābhiniveśo vā /
K06bsu052_u:77: nāyaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra saṃnāha evaṃ saṃnaddhaḥ - kathamahaṃ sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā kuryāṃ pūrṇatvaṃ vā?
K06bsu052_u:78: sacedbhadanta śāradvatīputra parikalpamupādāya ekaikasmin buddhakṣetre gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyuḥ,
K06bsu052_u:79: ekaikaśca tathāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhet sarātriṃdivaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ,
K06bsu052_u:80: ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sattvā vinītāḥ,
K06bsu052_u:82: evamapi kṛtvā naiva sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
K06bsu052_u:84: sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvād bhadanta śāradvatīputra sattvadhātorna conatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate //
K06bsu052_u:85: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadi mañjuśrīḥ sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvāt sattvadhātornaivonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate,
K06bsu052_u:87: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - yadā tāvadbhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sattvānupalabdhiḥ,
K06bsu052_u:91: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ //
K06bsu052_u:92: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadā tāvanmañjuśrīḥ atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ,
K06bsu052_u:94: sacenmañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiyantaḥ sattvā iti,
K06bsu052_u:96: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yāvanta eva buddhadharmā iti /
K06bsu052_u:97: saced bhagavan punarapi pṛcchet - kiyatpramāṇaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
K06bsu052_u:98: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpramāṇo buddhaviṣayaḥ [iti] //
K06bsu052_u:99: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃparyāpannaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
K06bsu052_u:101: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatparyāpannānutpādācintyatā [iti] //
K06bsu052_u:102: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
K06bsu052_u:104: mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpratiṣṭhito 'nutpādadhātuḥ tatpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti //
K06bsu052_u:105: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
K06bsu052_u:107: mañjuśrīrāha - yasminnahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
K06bsu052_u:109: bhagavānāha - apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
K06bsu052_u:110: mañjuśrīrāha - saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhānam //
K06bsu052_u:111: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
K06bsu052_u:112: kataratte kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaye upacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā?
K06bsu052_u:113: mañjuśrīrāha - na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiṃcitkuśalamūlamupacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā /
K06bsu052_u:114: nāsau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyaciddharmasya upacayo vā apacayo vā bhavati /
K06bsu052_u:116: yā kasyaciddharmasya upacayāya vā apacayāya vā pratyupasthitā /
K06bsu052_u:117: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti,
K06bsu052_u:120: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā yaṃ dharmaṃ prajahyādupādadīta vā /
K06bsu052_u:121: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva saṃsāradoṣānupayāti na nirvāṇaguṇān /
K06bsu052_u:123: tathā hi bhagavan saṃsārameva tāvann samanupaśyāmi,
K06bsu052_u:127: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kasyaciddharmasyādānaṃ vā grahaṇaṃ vā niḥsaraṇaṃ vā /
K06bsu052_u:128: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya hānirvā vṛddhirvopalabhyate /
K06bsu052_u:130: na hi bhagavan anutpādo hīyate vā vardhate vā /
K06bsu052_u:133: sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati vā nirodhayati vā /
K06bsu052_u:134: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā karoti /
K06bsu052_u:137: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitabhāvanā yā naivācintyān dharmān prārthayate na prādeśikān /
K06bsu052_u:138: api tu khalu punarbhagavan tadapi na saṃvidyate yatprārthayate,
K06bsu052_u:142: evaṃ pratyupasthitā ime dharmā agrāḥ ime dharmā hīnā iti /
K06bsu052_u:143: nāpi tān dharmānupalabhate yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmagratā vā hīnatā vā syāt /
K06bsu052_u:145: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kaṃciddharmamagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā kalpayati /
K06bsu052_u:147: na hi bhagavan anutpādasya kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā,
K06bsu052_u:150: yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā /
K06bsu052_u:152: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - na punarmañjuśrīḥ agrā buddhadharmāḥ?
K06bsu052_u:154: tatkiṃ punarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ?
K06bsu052_u:156: mañjuśrīrāha - tatkiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyā agratā vā hīnatā prajñāyate?
K06bsu052_u:162: tathā hi bhagavan teṣvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
K06bsu052_u:164: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na buddhadharmāṇāmārādhanāya saṃvartate na pṛgjanadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartate /
K06bsu052_u:168: punaraparaṃ sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yā na kaṃciddharmaṃ cintayati na vijānīte /
K06bsu052_u:173: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kasyaciddharmasya vikalpena pratyupasthitā - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ,
K06bsu052_u:177: tameva bhagavan dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kulaputro nopalabhate,
K06bsu052_u:184: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktasya kulaputrasyaivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ kāmadhātuḥ,
K06bsu052_u:189: tathā hi sa bhagavan na kaściddharmaḥ,
K06bsu052_u:192: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 344) punaraparaṃ bhagavan eṣā sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyopakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā karoti /
K06bsu052_u:193: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dhātrī,
K06bsu052_u:195: eṣaiva sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ,
K06bsu052_u:198: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvamimamevaṃrūpaṃ gambhīraṃ dharmaṃ deśayasi /
K06bsu052_u:199: sthāpitā te mañjuśrīriyaṃ mudrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
K06bsu052_u:201: aupalambhikānāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ pratibodhāya /
K06bsu052_u:202: na te mañjuśrīḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
K06bsu052_u:203: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
K06bsu052_u:204: api tu khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ atikramya te buddhasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu052_u:205: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
K06bsu052_u:207: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ /
K06bsu052_u:210: mañjuśrīrāha - eṣā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya sthitimupalabhate nāsthitim /
K06bsu052_u:218: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yatra buddhadharmā api nābhimukhībhavanti kutaḥ punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ /
K06bsu052_u:222: bhāvanāmāgamya acintyānapi buddhadharmānacintyā buddhadharmā iti na vikalpamāpadyate /
K06bsu052_u:223: seyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvadharmāvikalpāya draṣṭavyā //
K06bsu052_u:228: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti
K06bsu052_u:230: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā samanupaśyati /
K06bsu052_u:232: sā caiṣā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjananānātvaṃ karoti,
K06bsu052_u:237: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 345) atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - kiyantastvayā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ?
K06bsu052_u:238: mañjuśrīrāha - yāvanto bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya cittacaitasikā niruddhāḥ,
K06bsu052_u:241: mañjuśrīrāha - kaścitpunarbhagavan sa dharma upalabhyate yo na buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ?
K06bsu052_u:243: mañjuśrīrāha - bhagavan tava tāvadete buddhadharmā iti nāma na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K06bsu052_u:246: mañjuśrīrāha - tadyadā tāvadahaṃ bhagavan na saṅgataiva,
K06bsu052_u:254: mañjuśrīrāha - asanneṣa bhagavan kāyo na satkāyaḥ /
K06bsu052_u:257: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - niyatāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
K06bsu052_u:258: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //
K06bsu052_u:259: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - āsannībhūtāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
K06bsu052_u:265: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - buddhā eva te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā draṣṭavyāḥ,
K06bsu052_u:270: atha khalu nirālambā bhaginī bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
K06bsu052_u:275: tathā hi bhagavan nirālambāḥ sarvadharmā asaṃvidyamānatvāt /
K06bsu052_u:277: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma - evametacchāradvatīputra, evametat /
K06bsu052_u:286: te te śāradvatīputra paramadānapatayo bhaviṣyanti mahādānapatayo viśiṣṭadānapatayaḥ /
K06bsu052_u:287: te te śāradvatīputra śīlasaṃpannā bhaviṣyanti paramaśīlavantaḥ paramaviśiṣṭaśīlaguṇapathaprāptāḥ,
K06bsu052_u:294: te te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yāvat sarvakāravaropetena sarvajñajñānena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu052_u:297: punaraparaṃ bhagavan mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūmetadavocat - kaṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan icchasyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
K06bsu052_u:303: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
K06bsu052_u:306: mañjuśrīrāha - labdha eva bhagavan dharmaḥ syāt,
K06bsu052_u:308: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīrimāṃ mama śrāvakasaṃpadam?
K06bsu052_u:311: mañjuśrīrāha - tathāhaṃ bhagavan paśyāmi yathā naiva pṛthagjanāna paśyāmi,
K06bsu052_u:321: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śrāvakayānikānevaṃ paśyasi,
K06bsu052_u:323: mañjuśrīrāha - bodhisattva iti bhadanta śāradvatīputra nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
K06bsu052_u:324: bodhāya saṃprasthita iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
K06bsu052_u:325: bodhāya caratīti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
K06bsu052_u:326: abhisaṃbudhyata iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
K06bsu052_u:328: śāradvatīputra āha - tathāgataṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ paśyasi?
K06bsu052_u:331: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - buddha iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
K06bsu052_u:338: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra apadādhivacanametad yadidamucyate buddha iti /
K06bsu052_u:339: na hyetadbhadanta śāradvatīputra vācābhirvijñāpayituṃ buddha iti /
K06bsu052_u:340: vāgapi bhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukarā nirūpayitum - iyaṃ vāgiti,
K06bsu052_u:342: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra yadevaṃ vadasi - kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti,
K06bsu052_u:343: yo na samudāgato notpanno na nirotsyate,
K06bsu052_u:344: yo na kenaciddharmeṇa samanvāgato nāpyatra kiṃcitpadamabhedam,
K06bsu052_u:345: apadasyaitadbhadanta śāradvatīputra adhivacanaṃ yaduta buddha iti /
K06bsu052_u:346: tathāgataṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryeṣitukāmena ātmā paryeṣitavyaḥ /
K06bsu052_u:348: yathā ātmā atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
K06bsu052_u:355: evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukaramājñātuṃ buddha iti yadadhivacanam //
K06bsu052_u:356: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - nāyaṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathā deśayati yathā ādikarmikā bodhisattvā ājānīyuḥ
K06bsu052_u:357: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra tathā deśayāmi yathā kṛtāvino 'pyarhanta ājñāsyanti /
K06bsu052_u:375: mañjuśrīrāha - na bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhagavatā dharmadhāturabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
K06bsu052_u:377: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra dharmadhātureva bhagavān /
K06bsu052_u:380: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra sa eva dharmadhāturbodhiḥ /
K06bsu052_u:388: avijñaptikamiti bhadanta śāradvatīputra naitacchakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ saṃskṛtatvena vā yāvad asaṃskṛtatvena vā /
K06bsu052_u:393: tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādurbhāvo nāsti yasmin sthitvā vijñapyeran /
K06bsu052_u:408: na hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra anutpādasya mūlaṃ vā agraṃ vā iṣyate /
K06bsu052_u:411: adhikasamārope bhadanta sāradvatīputra caran loke dakṣiṇīyo bhavati /
K06bsu052_u:414: śrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
K06bsu052_u:415: aśrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
K06bsu052_u:416: kalpito bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
K06bsu052_u:417: akalpiko bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
K06bsu052_u:419: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
K06bsu052_u:422: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - asamupahatanetrīko bhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsrava ityucyate /
K06bsu052_u:425: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
K06bsu052_u:426: mañjuśrīrāha - aṇūnyapi tasya bhayāni na saṃvidyante /
K06bsu052_u:428: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - anuttīrṇabhaya iti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanamiti //
K06bsu052_u:429: śāradvatīputra āha - anutpannakṣāntika iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
K06bsu052_u:430: mañjuśrīrāha - yena bhadanta śāradvatīputra aṇurapi dharmo notpāditaḥ,
K06bsu052_u:432: śāradvatīputra āha - avinīto bhikṣuriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
K06bsu052_u:433: mañjuśrīrāha - avinīto bhikṣuriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam /
K06bsu052_u:437: idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - avinīto bhikṣuriti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam //
K06bsu052_u:438: śāradvatīputra āha - adhicitte caratīti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
K06bsu052_u:439: mañjuśrīrāha - adhicitte caratīti bhadanta śāradvatīputra pṛthagjanasyaitadadhivacanam /
K06bsu052_u:440: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi?
K06bsu052_u:441: mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra so 'dhikaroti //
K06bsu052_u:442: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
K06bsu052_u:447: tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra kṣīṇā me āsravāḥ ḥrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā /
K06bsu052_u:448: anena bhadanta ḥāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa kṣīṇāsravo na cārhan //
K06bsu052_u:449: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 349) atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - syānmañjuśrīḥ
K06bsu052_u:450: paryāyo yadbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'bhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
K06bsu052_u:451: mañjuśrīrāhasyādbhagavan paryāyaḥ yabdodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaḥ abhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
K06bsu052_u:453: tathā hi bodhāvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
K06bsu052_u:461: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa abhavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum //
K06bsu052_u:462: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - bodhiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam?
K06bsu052_u:465: tathā hi bodhiprakṛtikānyeva tāni pañcānantaryāṇi abhāvatvāt /
K06bsu052_u:476: api tu khalu punarbhagavan abhimānikaiḥ sthāpitānyetāni abhisaṃbudhāni(ddhā? )
K06bsu052_u:478: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - kiṃ te mañjuśrīḥ mamāntike evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti?
K06bsu052_u:481: na me bhagavan evaṃ bhavet - tathāgato me tathāgata iti /
K06bsu052_u:483: [tathā caiva tathatā ca] yathā ca tathātā,
K06bsu052_u:485: tathā hi bhagavan na tathatā tathāgataṃ vijñapayati,
K06bsu052_u:490: tasmāttarhi bhagavan na me evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti /
K06bsu052_u:491: api tu tathāgata iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātrametat /
K06bsu052_u:492: tat kataro 'sau tathāgato yatra me evaṃ bhaviṣyati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti?
K06bsu052_u:499: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - na tava mañjuśrīrevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgata iti?
K06bsu052_u:502: bhagavānāha - nādhimucyase tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvṛtā iti?
K06bsu052_u:503: mañjuśrīrāha - kaścit punarbhagavan ekaviṣayā buddha bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ? (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 350)
K06bsu052_u:508: mañjuśrīrāha - tena hi bhagavan ete gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto na parinirvṛtāḥ /
K06bsu052_u:510: tathā hi bhagavan ekaviṣayā buddhā bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ /
K06bsu052_u:511: na ca acintyatā utpadyate nirudhyate vā /
K06bsu052_u:513: ye 'pi te anāgate 'dhvani tathagatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti,
K06bsu052_u:516: na hi acintyatā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
K06bsu052_u:518: prapañcayanti te bhagavan lokasaṃniveśaṃ yeṣāmevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgato yāvat parinirvāsyati veti //
K06bsu052_u:519: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ idaṃ tathāgatācintyam,
K06bsu052_u:520: acintyaṃ niścintyaṃ tathāgatasya vā agrata udāhārairudāhareḥ,
K06bsu052_u:521: avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vā arhato vā kṣīṇāsravasya /
K06bsu052_u:527: mañjuśrīrāha - acintyānāṃ niścintyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ ko 'trānujñāsyati vā pratikrokṣyati vā?
K06bsu052_u:530: mañjuśrīrāha - pṛthagjanā api bhagavan tathaiva niścintyāḥ?
K06bsu052_u:547: tataḥ paścājjñāsyatha - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ ime āryadharmā iti //
K06bsu052_u:548: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam?
K06bsu052_u:554: bhagavānāha - icchasi punastvaṃ mañjuśrīrevam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti?
K06bsu052_u:555: mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan evam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti,
K06bsu052_u:558: na bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ kaśyacidupakāreṇa vā apakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
K06bsu052_u:565: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīrevamicchasi - anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ tathāgata iti?
K06bsu052_u:570: api tu khalu punarbhagavan nātra kaściddharmaḥ samudāgacchati na kṣīyate /
K06bsu052_u:572: tatra ca bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate /
K06bsu052_u:573: bhagavānāha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi - tatra kṣetre bījamavaropitaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate iti?
K06bsu052_u:574: mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhagavan acintyaṃ tatkṣetram,
K06bsu052_u:576: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena ṣaḍvikāraṃ mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt,
K06bsu052_u:578: saptānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ trayāṇāṃ copāsakaśatānāṃ catvāriṃśataścopāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭeśca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devakoṭīniyutaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam //
K06bsu052_u:579: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumāṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
K06bsu052_u:580: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya?
K06bsu052_u:581: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmāntamānandametadavocat - ayamānanda puṇyakṣetranirdeśo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pūrvakairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhāṣitaḥ /
K06bsu052_u:583: ayaṃ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya //
